segments.text: Would you mind giving me a hand ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Help me hang up this picture , please . Would you hold it straight while I put in the nail ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Now , hand me the hammer and those nails , please .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: There ! How does it look ? Tell me if I've got it straight .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , it's straight , but it's upside down I'm afraid .
segments.speaker: S2
